title: Active Inference in Climate Science and Modeling
description: Application of Active Inference to climate system modeling, prediction, and decision making under uncertainty.
learning_objectives: Model complex climate systems using Active Inference
Handle deep uncertainty in climate predictions

content.overview: Climate systems are complex, high-dimensional, and deeply uncertain. Active Inference provides a framework for modeling climate dynamics, making predictions under uncertainty, and designing adaptive policies that account for our limited understanding of these systems.
